com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Interface StaticTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelectionTool, AbstractTransformTool, LassoTool, PerspectiveTool, ProjectionTool, RotateTool, RubberSheetTool, ScaleTool, SelectionTool, SlantTool

    public interface StaticTransformer
    Defines an object that can perform a well-defined set of "static" transforms on an image. A static transform is one that does not require a user interface (like those provided by RotateTool or ProjectionTool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void adjustBrightness(int delta)
      Adjusts the brightness of the image by the amount specified in delta while preserving the image's alpha transparency.
      void adjustTransparency(int delta)
      Adjusts the alpha transparency of the image while maintain hue, saturation and brightness.
      void applyTransform(AffineTransform transform)
      Applies an AffineTransform the current image.
      void flipHorizontal()
      Flips or mirrors the image along its vertical axis.
      void flipVertical()
      Flips or mirrors the image along its horizontal axis.
      void invert()
      Inverts the color of the image while preserving the alpha transparency.
      void rotateLeft()
      Rotates the image 90 degrees counter-clockwise.
      void rotateRight()
      Rotates the image 90 degrees clockwise.

    • Method Detail

      • rotateLeft

        void rotateLeft()
        Rotates the image 90 degrees counter-clockwise.

      • rotateRight

        void rotateRight()
        Rotates the image 90 degrees clockwise.

      • flipHorizontal

        void flipHorizontal()
        Flips or mirrors the image along its vertical axis. That is, all pixels on the left side of the image will move the right side and vice versa.

      • flipVertical

        void flipVertical()
        Flips or mirrors the image along its horizontal axis. That is, all pixels on the top of the image will move to the bottom and vice versa.

      • adjustBrightness

        void adjustBrightness(int delta)
        Adjusts the brightness of the image by the amount specified in delta while preserving the image's alpha transparency.
        Parameters:
        delta - An amount by which brightness should be adjusted, -256 to +256. Negative numbers darken an image, positive numbers brighten it.

      • adjustTransparency

        void adjustTransparency(int delta)
        Adjusts the alpha transparency of the image while maintain hue, saturation and brightness.
        Parameters:
        delta - An amount by which transparency should be adjusted -256 to +256; Negative numbers make the image more transparent, positive numbers make the image more opaque.

      • invert

        void invert()
        Inverts the color of the image while preserving the alpha transparency.

      • applyTransform

        void applyTransform(AffineTransform transform)
        Applies an AffineTransform the current image.
        Parameters:
        transform - The transform to apply.
